text.aerial_bombing.requires_elytra: Elytra flight is required for aerial bombing!
text.aerial_bombing.requires_tnt: You must hold TNT in your main hand!
text.aerial_bombing.requires_flint: Requires Flint and Steel in the off-hand to ignite!
text.autoconfig.aerial-bombing.title: Aerial Bombing Configuration
text.autoconfig.aerial-bombing.option.en: If enabled, players can drop TNT while flying with Elytra.
text.autoconfig.aerial-bombing.option.re: If enabled, players must hold Flint and Steel in their off-hand.
text.autoconfig.aerial-bombing.option.bo: The cooldown time in milliseconds between each bomb drop.
The explosion power of the dropped TNT. (Vanilla TNT is 4)
text.autoconfig.aerial-bombing.option.us: Enable to use the advanced physics engine with more variables.
Disable to use the original, simpler physics simulation.
text.autoconfig.aerial-bombing.option.ad: Percentage of player's horizontal speed transferred to the bomb.
Percentage of player's vertical speed transferred to the bomb.
Additional force applied in the player's looking direction.
Simulates bomb rotation by inheriting some of the player's angular velocity.
Enables a more realistic air resistance model.
Percentage of player's angular momentum transferred to the bomb.
